item.title: I'm joining Neudesic to build a Google Cloud team
item.description:
I’ve decided to accept a new challenge, and join the Neudesic team. I’m to be their new Director, Google Cloud, helping to build a team ready to work on Google Cloud Platform projects.

Wish me luck!
